body:
This is actually a bug of Chrome, it is not impossible to reproduce in normal browser window since the focus will be switched to address bar, but you can reproduce it in Chrome app.

Steps:
- Download the hello-world app: https://gist.github.com/zcbenz/d041c65526156cb339cf
- Load it in Chrome
- You can see the exact problem in the Chrome app

I'm closing this since there is nothing we can do in Electron, it is most likely a bug in blink, but we don't have the resources of fixing the bug and pushing it to upstream. I suggest reporting it to [Chromium's issues list](https://crbug.com), but it is very likely to be low-priorly.
